name: meta
description: Object containing options for the meta navigation.

arguments.name: items
arguments.description: Array of items for use in the meta section of the footer.

params.name: text
params.description: List item text in the meta section of the footer.

params.name: href
params.description: List item href attribute in the meta section of the footer.

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the anchor in the footer meta section.

name: navigation
description: Array of items for use in the navigation section of the footer.

arguments.name: columns
arguments.description: Amount of columns to display items in navigation section of the footer.

arguments.name: items
arguments.description: Array of items to display in the list in navigation section of the footer.

arguments.name: text
arguments.description: List item text in the navigation section of the footer.

arguments.name: href
arguments.description: List item href attribute in the navigation section of the footer. Both `text` and `href` attributes need to be present to create a link.

arguments.name: attributes
arguments.description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the anchor in the footer navigation section.

name: containerClasses
description: Classes that can be added to the inner container, useful if you want to make the footer full width.

name: classes
description: Classes to add to the footer component container.

name: attributes
description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the footer component container.
